summary: Feature request to auto-skip time when waiting on update results in time-skipping testing environments, similar to how time is already auto-skipped when waiting on workflow results.
userImpact: Testing workflows with updates requires manual time-skipping configuration, making tests less convenient and less consistent with workflow result testing.
proposedFix: Implement auto-skip time for update result waiting, consistent with existing auto-skip behavior for workflow results.
keyQuote: We auto-skip time when waiting on workflow result, we need to do the same when waiting on update result.
